TravelPackage.Title: Bangalore & Coorg Escape
TravelPackage.Description: Explore the vibrant city of Bangalore and unwind in the lush hills of Coorg.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Begin your journey in Bangalore, a dynamic city where modern tech parks coexist with colonial architecture and serene gardens. Visit iconic spots like Lalbagh Botanical Garden, Cubbon Park, and the majestic Bangalore Palace. Enjoy local cuisine and vibrant nightlife before heading to the tranquil hills of Coorg.

In Coorg, immerse yourself in the aroma of coffee plantations and the serenity of mist-covered landscapes. Trek through lush forests, visit the Abbey Falls, and experience the spiritual calm of Namdroling Monastery. This package offers the perfect blend of urban energy and natural retreat.

TravelPackage.Title: Heritage Trail: Mysore & Hampi
TravelPackage.Description: Discover the royal palaces of Mysore and the ancient ruins of Hampi.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Step into the regal world of Mysore, where the grandeur of Mysore Palace and the charm of Devaraja Market await. Witness the cultural richness of Karnataka through silk weaving, sandalwood carving, and traditional cuisine. The city’s blend of history and elegance makes it a heritage lover’s dream.

Then journey to Hampi, a UNESCO World Heritage Site that transports you to the Vijayanagara Empire. Explore ancient temples, monolithic sculptures, and surreal boulder-strewn landscapes. This trail is a deep dive into South India’s architectural and spiritual legacy.

TravelPackage.Title: Kerala Backwaters & Tea Gardens
TravelPackage.Description: Cruise through Alleppey’s backwaters and stroll through Munnar’s tea estates.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Start your Kerala journey in Alleppey, where houseboats glide through tranquil backwaters lined with coconut palms and quaint villages. Enjoy freshly cooked meals onboard and watch life unfold along the canals. It’s a peaceful escape into nature’s rhythm.

Then ascend to Munnar’s misty hills, where tea plantations stretch endlessly across the landscape. Visit the Tea Museum, hike to Top Station, and breathe in the cool mountain air. This package offers a sensory blend of water, greenery, and serenity.

TravelPackage.Title: Spiritual South: Tirupati & Madurai
TravelPackage.Description: Visit sacred temples and experience the spiritual essence of South India.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Begin with Tirupati, home to the revered Venkateswara Temple atop the Tirumala hills. Witness the devotion of thousands and participate in rituals that have been practiced for centuries. The spiritual energy here is palpable and deeply moving.

Continue to Madurai, one of India’s oldest cities, where the Meenakshi Amman Temple dazzles with its towering gopurams and intricate carvings. Explore temple corridors, attend evening aarti, and feel the timeless pulse of South Indian spirituality.

TravelPackage.Title: Adventure in Chikmagalur
TravelPackage.Description: Trek through coffee plantations and enjoy scenic mountain views.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Chikmagalur is a haven for adventure seekers and nature lovers. Begin your journey with treks through aromatic coffee estates and misty hills. Mullayanagiri, the highest peak in Karnataka, offers breathtaking views and thrilling trails.

Explore waterfalls like Hebbe and Jhari, and unwind in eco-resorts surrounded by greenery. Whether you're sipping fresh coffee or hiking through dense forests, Chikmagalur promises a rejuvenating escape with a touch of adrenaline.

TravelPackage.Title: Tamil Nadu Temple Trail
TravelPackage.Description: Explore iconic temples in Kanchipuram, Thanjavur, and Rameswaram.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Embark on a spiritual and architectural journey through Tamil Nadu’s temple towns. In Kanchipuram, marvel at ancient Dravidian temples and shop for exquisite silk sarees. Thanjavur’s Brihadeeswarar Temple stands as a testament to Chola grandeur and engineering brilliance.

Finally, reach Rameswaram, a sacred island linked to the Ramayana. Walk across the floating Pamban Bridge and bathe in the temple’s holy wells. This trail is a soulful blend of mythology, art, and devotion.

TravelPackage.Title: Bangalore City Break
TravelPackage.Description: Experience the tech capital’s nightlife, gardens, and shopping streets.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Dive into Bangalore’s vibrant urban culture. Visit the iconic Lalbagh and Cubbon Park for a breath of fresh air, then explore MG Road and Brigade Road for shopping and street food. The city’s blend of tradition and innovation is captivating.

Enjoy rooftop cafes, live music venues, and buzzing nightlife. Whether you're a foodie, a tech enthusiast, or a culture buff, Bangalore offers a dynamic city break that’s both exciting and enriching.

TravelPackage.Title: Western Ghats Nature Retreat
TravelPackage.Description: Reconnect with nature in Wayanad and Bandipur National Park.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Start in Wayanad, where lush forests, waterfalls, and ancient caves await. Trek to Edakkal Caves, visit Banasura Sagar Dam, and relax in jungle resorts surrounded by wildlife. The region’s biodiversity and tranquility are unmatched.

Then head to Bandipur National Park for thrilling safaris and close encounters with elephants, deer, and maybe even a tiger. This retreat is perfect for those seeking peace, adventure, and a deep connection with nature.

TravelPackage.Title: South India Grand Tour
TravelPackage.Description: A complete journey through Karnataka, Kerala, and Tamil Nadu.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
This grand tour covers the best of South India—from the palaces of Mysore to the backwaters of Kerala and the temples of Tamil Nadu. Each destination offers a unique flavor, whether it’s heritage, nature, or spirituality.

Enjoy curated experiences like houseboat stays, temple visits, wildlife safaris, and cultural performances. With expert guides and seamless travel, this package is ideal for those who want to see it all in one unforgettable journey.

TravelPackage.Title: Luxury Bangalore & Ooty Getaway
TravelPackage.Description: Stay in premium resorts and enjoy curated experiences in Bangalore and Ooty.
TravelPackage.DetailedDescription:
Begin in Bangalore with luxury stays and curated city tours that blend comfort with culture. Visit art galleries, dine at gourmet restaurants, and unwind in serene gardens. The city’s cosmopolitan vibe is perfect for indulgent travelers.

Then escape to Ooty’s cool hills, where colonial charm meets natural beauty. Stay in heritage resorts, ride the Nilgiri Mountain Railway, and stroll through botanical gardens. This getaway is all about pampering and picturesque landscapes.

Review.Comment: Amazing trip! The city tour was fantastic.
